---
title: "Plot Deconstruction"
output: html_document
date: "2024-05-15"
---

```{r}
#Import Dataset 

chl_data<- read.csv("data/Chlorophyll_data.csv")

```



```{r}
# Creating New Plot after deconstruction
# We added the geom_smooth() function and altered the x and y axis scales 
# We altered the colors to optimize visualization
ggplot(data = chl_data) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = chl.a, color=Area)) +
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = chl.a, color=Area)) +
  labs(x= "Year", y=bquote(Chlorophyll ~ Concentration~(mgm^{-3}))) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,1.5))
ggsave("my_plot.pdf")


```
